name: Light Flight (Chewy27)
description:
Light Flight is a Round based flying game inspired by Tron Light Cycles. In Light Flight, you fly around an arena creating a trail of light behind you. If a player (including yourself) runs into your light, they will be eliminated. Hitting the outer wall also results in an instant elimination. Play with up to 3 of your friends in Local Multiplayer. Or against up to 4 computer-controlled enemies and Choose from 5 different Power-Ups to use in play. The last one standing wins.

Controls:

Shift/Right-Trigger = Accelerate

Left-Control/Left-Trigger = Decelerate 

WASD/Left-Stick = Turning

Q-E/Left and Right Bumpers = Roll

F-key/X-button = Cycle Colour

R-key/Y-Button = Enable Rainbow Mode

X-C/ D-pad Left and Right = Change Field of View

Scroll-wheel/ D-pad Up and Down = Change Zoom

Currently Known Bugs:

Computer-controlled enemies often slightly clip through the outer wall after spawning

Trail flashing from being hit can get stuck as white or not flash for long enough.

Players can sometimes get spawned directly in front of the arena walls, causing them to immediately get eliminated if they are not quick enough.

Exiting and Rentering the Play Options Menu can reset what options were chosen

--If you encounter more bugs, please post them on the discussions board--

Planned Features:

Showing Controls in-game or on a menu.

Proper Colour selection/Team mode in the menu.

New Button designs.

Minimum Tested Specs:

Intel Core I5-2400 + Radeon RX550 4GB.

File size: 1.18GB

--Please note that longer rounds or more players may result in lower performance. Using the Arena Clear powerup can help keep the game running smoothly while still allowing long rounds.--

Made in Unreal Engine 4 with help from https://sugoi-yellow.itch.io/

Light Flight Currently does not support Dualshock 4 controllers.
